sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_table_bldr_wzd.TBWSheetAPI</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TBWSheetAPI</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TBWSheetAPI = Class.create();

TBWSheetAPI.prototype = {
    initialize: function(attachmentId) {
        this.sysId = attachmentId;
    },

    build: function() {
        var result = this._validate();

        if (!result.isValid)
            return TBWUtil.error(result);

        return this._getSheetsInfo();
    },

    _getSheetsInfo: function _getSheetsInfo() {
        var gParser = new sn_impex.GlideExcelParser();
        var gAttachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
        var stream = gAttachment.getContentStream(this.sysId);

        if (!gParser.parse(stream)) {
            throw gs.getMessage('Attachment could not be parsed as an Excel Spreadsheet ${0}', this.sysId);
        }

        return gParser.getSheetNames()
            .map(function(sheetName, index) {
                return {
                    sheetName: sheetName,
                    sheetNumber: index + 1
                };
            });

    },

    _validate: function _validate() {
        var res = Validators.isValidAttachment(this.sysId);
		
        if (!res.isValid)
            return res;

        return {
            isValid: true
        };
    },

    type: 'TBWSheetAPI'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-24 11:27:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9efcf0787711011066cfa9ff9a5a99e9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TBWSheetAPI</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AES Table Builder Wizard" source="sn_table_bldr_wzd">5fc95d0df025bde7fac20ba52d0ecc05</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="AES Table Builder Wizard">5fc95d0df025bde7fac20ba52d0ecc05</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9efcf0787711011066cfa9ff9a5a99e9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-24 11:27:37</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
